coreAttributes.name: skater dress
coreAttributes.description: A sleeveless skater dress, held up by a pair of thin straps that loop over the wearer's shoulders.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] on the skater dress, tidying the skirt down before moving the straps into a comfortable position on [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skater dress over [npc2.namePos] head and down around [npc2.her] torso, tidying the skirt before moving the straps to sit comfortably on [npc2.her] shoulders.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the skater dress over [npc2.namePos] head and down around [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] skater dress up over [npc.her] head and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] skater dress up over [npc2.her] head and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] skater dress up over [npc2.her] head and [npc.verb(take)] it off.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] skater dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] skater dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of the skirt of [npc2.namePos] skater dress, before roughly pulling it up.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt of [npc.her] skater dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt [npc2.namePos] skater dress back down into the proper position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt [npc2.namePos] skater dress back down into the proper position.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shrug)] off the shoulder straps of [npc.her] skater dress and [npc.verb(allow)] the top half to fall down around [npc.her] waist.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] skater dress down off [npc2.her] shoulders, before tugging it down around [npc.her] waist.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the straps of [npc2.namePos] skater dress down off [npc2.her] shoulders, before forcefully yanking it down around [npc.her] waist.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the top half of [npc.her] skater dress back up into its proper position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the top half of [npc2.namePos] skater dress back up into its proper position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the top half of [npc2.namePos] skater dress back up into its proper position.
